Summary._: 34 St-Hudson Yards bound [7] trains are running with delays because of switch problems at 111 St.

Summary._: Southbound [A] and Rockaway Park [S] service changes and delays because of switch problems at Broad Channel. See mta.info

Description._:
Southbound [A] trains are stopping along the Rockaway Park [S] shuttle line between Broad Channel and Rockaway Park-116 St.

There is limited southbound [A] train service between Broad Channel and Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

These service changes are because of switch problems at Broad Channel.

As an alternative customers may take the Q22 bus running between Beach 67 St and Rockaway Park-116 St or the Q52 or Q53-SBS buses running between Rockaway Blvd and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

LongDescription:
Southbound [A] trains are stopping along the Rockaway Park [S] shuttle line between Broad Channel and Rockaway Park-116 St.
There is limited southbound [A] train service between Broad Channel and Far Rockaway-Mott Av. 
These service changes are because of switch problems at Broad Channel. 
As an alternative customers may take the Q22 bus running between Beach 67 St and Rockaway Park-116 St or the Q52 or Q53-SBS buses running between Rockaway Blvd and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

Summary._: Northbound [B] and [Q] trains are running with delays because of switch problems at Prospect Park.

Description._:
Northbound [B] trains are running local between Brighton Beach and Prospect Park.

Northbound [B] and [Q] trains are running with delays.

These service changes are because of switch problems at Prospect Park.

Expect delays on the [B], [N] and [Q] trains.

LongDescription:
Northbound [B] trains are running local between Brighton Beach and Prospect Park.
Northbound [B] and [Q] trains are running with delays.
These service changes are because of switch problems at Prospect Park.
Expect delays on the [B], [N] and [Q] trains.
